a plant with brightly coloured flowers with five pointed petals that hang down and that is grown in gardens: A swathe of pink and purple aquilegia filled the cottage flowerbed. They decided to plant aquilegias, which are easy to grow and flower early. Aquilegia are tough plants requiring little attention.
